verses.roman:
yuyodha balir indreṇa
tārakeṇa guho 'syata
varuṇo hetināyudhyan
mitro rājan prahetinā

synonyms: yuyodha—fought; baliḥ—Mahārāja Bali; indreṇa—with King Indra; tārakeṇa—with Tāraka; guhaḥ—Kārttikeya; asyata—engaged in fighting; varuṇaḥ—the demigod Varuṇa; hetinā—with Heti; ayudhyat—fought one another; mitraḥ—the demigod Mitra; rājan—O King; prahetinā—with Praheti.
translation: O King, Mahārāja Bali fought with Indra, Kārttikeya with Tāraka, Varuṇa with Heti, and Mitra with Praheti.
